channel.title: Error Connecting to server after restarts
channel.description:
well i have made a server, everything is working fine and i had over 25 players on. But for some reason after updates nobody can get on for hours, and some people cant even get back on. My required ports are forwarded and windows firewall is off. Sometimes after restart i get Norton Anti-virus message saying Default Serv Me Trojan Horse messages. For that reason i dont want to disable norton
Can anyone help?

item.title: Error Connecting to server after restarts
item.dc:creator: @staxta staxta
item.description:
@staxta wrote:

im using pimpscape and havent downloaded anything apart from the source itself

Read full topic
